description.en: Developing a web-based application that allows customers to schedule appointments with providers and use their services, post a review and automate a ranking of the bests providers.
Coded a native Android & iOS application to manage personal finances, allowing to store records such as expenses and income, automatizing balances and reports.
Built a desktop application that allows users to post thoughts through little texts, watch content from other users and search posts by keywords.
Online platform about credit applications oriented to PYMEs, where I developed the frontend for each administrative area.
description.es: Plataforma en línea de solicitudes de créditos orientada a PYMEs, donde desarrollé el frontend de cada área administrativa.

description.en: Web app for people interested in taking care of the environment, linking their recycling with entities or people and get points.
description.es: Aplicación web para personas interesadas en cuidar al medio ambiente, vinculando sus reciclajes con entidades o personas y recibir puntos.

description.en: Web-based system oriented to little companies so that they can manage efficiently their inventory.
description.es: Sistema web orientado a pequeñas empresas para que puedan gestionar eficientemente su inventario.

description.en: Instant messaging web application on real time which makes easy the communication between users.
description.es: Aplicación web de mensajería instantánea en tiempo real que facilita la comunicación entre usuarios.

description.en: Web-based system that allows users to search a event house, make the online payment with Mercado Pago, and schedule a time.
description.es: Sistema web que permite a los usuarios buscar una casa de eventos, hacer el pago en línea con Mercado Pago, y asignar un turno.

description.en: Web application that allows users to bet for the result of a match and earn points in their account.
description.es: Aplicación web que permite a los usuarios apostar por el resultado de un partido y ganar puntos en su cuenta.

description.en: Developed a secure RESTful API to simulate a virtual library where users can post books, create collections and share reviews.
Crafted a RESTful API to manage personal tasks creating to-do lists and filtering by status, category or tags.
Designed a website that calculates totality based by denomination cash amount, useful for business with high cash flow in Colombia.
Designed a website and implemented a dependency to print little texts like quick notes or impromptu invoices.
